StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAUpdateCandEducTier]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@school_code int, @educ_level varchar(2), @educ_code char(1), @nwa_id int, @marine_candidate_id int
AS
declare @current_user varchar(25) declare @contract_begin_date date.me declare @.er int
set @contract_begin_date=(select contract_begin_date from contract where nwa_id=@nwa_id) set @.er=dbo.GetTier(@educ_code, @contract_begin_date, @marine_candidate_id)
if (user_name()=NULL or user_name()='dbo') begin set @current_user=suser_sname() end else begin set @current_user=user_name() end
set @current_user=le.(@current_user,15)
if @school_code is not NULL begin update candidate_educa.on set user_login=@current_user, update_date=getdate(), educa.on_.er=@.er where school_code=@school_code and educa.on_level=@educ_level and educa.on_code=@educ_code and marine_candidate_id=@marine_candidate_id end else begin print 'School Code cannot be NULL' end
